# Bo of Water (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]] \[[[Water Spells|water]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Shugenja Spells|Shugenja 2]] (water)

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Effect:** Bo-like beam

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Oriental Adventures (WotC), pg. 98

A 6-foot-long staff formed of water, which you can use with proficiency, springs forth from your hands. You wield this staff as if it were a quarterstaff. Attacks with the *bo of water* are regular melee attacks. The bo deals 1d8 points of damage +1 point per two caster levels (maximum +10). The bo is considered a +1 weapon for purposes of overcoming damage reduction.
